name: stylelint-config-sass-guidelines
description: Sharable stylelint config based on https://sass-guidelin.es/
author: Brett Jankord

scripts.release:major: npm test && npm version major -m "Released version %s" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm test && npm version minor -m "Released version %s" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: npm test && npm version patch -m "Released version %s" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
